info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:00PM CDT until August 07 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HITCHCOCK COUNTY... At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Stratton, or 9 miles west of Trenton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported up to ping pong ball sized hail 5 miles northwest of Stratton. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Trenton around 410 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
